text: Sir Patrick Jeremy Walker, KCB (25 February 1932 – 13 October 2021) was a British civil servant. He was Director General (DG) of MI5, the United Kingdom's internal security service, from 1988 to 1992. He died on 13 October 2021, at the age of 89.Sir Patrick Walker, Director General of MI5 who led the way as the agency shifted focus at the end of the Cold War – obituary ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British intelligence people
title: Patrick Walker (MI5 officer)
